t: Amazon International shopping and shipping made easy
s: International shipping made easy through the Amazon Global program. Amazon Global ships millions of products to over 100 countries worldwide. Simplify customs, track your purchases door-to-door and no hidden imports fees.
Online shopping for Our Brands Directory: Amazon Private Brands at Amazon.com

The Amazon Global Store purchases are supported by Amazon.com Customer Service. You can return items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. Simply use the Amazon.com Returns Support Center. The Amazon Global Store will cover the cost of international return shipping up to $20.
